description: This template is designed for performing analysis on a provided call recording transcript, specifically focusing on sentiment, agent behavior, customer experience, and issue resolution.

call_transcript.description: The full text of the call recording transcript to be analyzed.

sentiment_summary_caller.description: A brief summary of the caller's overall sentiment throughout the call.

agent_attitude.description: Description of the call center agent's attitude and demeanor during the call.

client_experience_assessment.description: Assessment of the overall client experience based on the call.

issue_addressed_happy.description: Indication of whether the client's issue was addressed and whether they seemed happy with the resolution (or lack thereof).

agent_improvement_suggestions.description: Suggestions on what the agent could have done differently to improve the call.

prompt_template:
